between the genes rather than the actual gene similarities or differences

something like that, is no big deal.  It's the communication and expression 
that makes the difference.  The people bathing in this water probably ALL 
have actual reasons why they're doing it –reasonably rational reasons. If 
this subterranean water is being pushed up by volcanic activity there is 
probably salts and other minerals that can have benefits on human health 
and well-being.  Whether they know these things or not, they're still being 
rational if they heard a neighbour or friend claim to have had positive

that looks clean is often not so because it is often bad chemicals in it
